name: Jaguar Carpet
description: A bold and contemporary floor covering that combines the functionality of a traditional carpet with the vibrant aesthetics of modern graphic art. Featuring intricate patterns, dynamic shapes, and striking color palettes, this carpet serves as both a practical flooring solution and a statement piece in any space.

name: Pink Trumpet
description: Made from high-quality, soft materials, it not only enhances your décor but also provides a cozy and comfortable surface underfoot. With its bold colors and imaginative design, the Smiley Face Carpet with 'G' Eyes is the perfect blend of fun and function.
